column4: hey i installed amarok and it won't play any song. when i start it, it says "The audio playback device HDA Intel (STAC92xx analog) does not work. Falling back to PulseAudio" does anyone know how to fix that?
does any sound at all work ????
when i play the mp3 from the rhythmbox it works fine
I dont have expertise in linux audio. I would get many audio programs and compare what works,what does. I use VLC alot also.
